name: Pixel_Phantoms_Official
description: The central command hub. A dynamic community platform featuring live leaderboards and dark mode protocols.
full_desc: Pixel Phantoms Official is the main portal for our community. It features a fully responsive design, custom glassmorphism effects, and dynamic leaderboards. Built with core web technologies to ensure maximum performance and accessibility.

name: Phantom_Bot_V2
description: An autonomous discord sentinel utilizing NLP to moderate comms and manage event protocols.
full_desc: Phantom Bot V2 is our next-gen Discord automation tool. It uses advanced NLP models to understand community intent, automate moderation, and provide real-time updates on community events and protocols.

name: Campus_Connect_App
description: Mobile interface for student tracking systems. Attendance, notes, and canteen logistics in real-time.
full_desc: Campus Connect is the ultimate mobile companion for students. It streamlines attendance tracking, resource sharing, and campus communications into a single, intuitive interface. Built with Flutter for a seamless cross-platform experience.

name: Smart_Lab_Matrix
description: Automated environment control system. Sensors dictate lighting and atmospheric conditions.
full_desc: Smart Lab Matrix is an integrated IoT environment. It uses a network of sensors and actuators to manage laboratory conditions, optimizing for both safety and energy efficiency. The system features a custom C++ kernel for low-latency operations.

name: Crypto_Tracker_Dash
description: Real-time visualization of decentralized currency markets via public API streams.
full_desc: Crypto Tracker Dash provides high-fidelity market data at your fingertips. It aggregates data from multiple decentralized exchanges and presents it through beautiful, interactive charts. Perfect for monitoring volatility across the ecosystem.

name: Sign_Lang_Recognizer
description: Computer vision protocol interpreting manual communication into digital text streams.
full_desc: The Sign Language Recognizer uses computer vision to break communication barriers. By analyzing hand gestures in real-time, it translates sign language into text, making digital interaction more accessible for the deaf and hard-of-hearing community.
